page.title: 04WANBOROUGH BAKERY
page.content: On the 23rd of may we visited wanborough bakery, it was built in 1938. The man who operates the bakery is called Mr HEWER, his grandfather started the buissnes,he had a oven in the corner of his garden and peddled round the village with his cart and it has been in the famly ever since.He enployes 22 workers and he has 6 vans to deliver the bread.He sells to 58 shops and he has 200 customers because he also sells to factories and cafes.He sells his bread all over swindon.He sells roughly 700 loaves,3000 cakes and 12000 rolls a day.He has two ovens, one he uses for cooking rolls the outher one he cooks bread in.He cooks rolls at night and bread in the day time,starting on sunday afternoon the bakery work continously till friday afternoon. it is a small family buisness
